messages.content: I was JUST thinking about how much I enjoyed Swalla la laaaa last night too!
I'd enjoy a nice warm hug. Along with a delightful conversation. But that works too.
If you feel like venting, I am happy to listen.
Enjoy it! You have a good one for your first!
[NAME] instead of [NAME] for me, but glad to see [NAME] is doing well.
The barriers in large only exist with respect to Canadian oil. Other producers (with the exclusion of Venezuela ) seem to be enjoying a very profitable time.
Hunting would at least be more rewarding and fun. Every time I wanna meal prep in RDO I just horseback ride and lock-on to deer.
Well the good news is once all the boomers die off you won't have any pesky old people to blame anymore.
It's refreshing to not see comments with anti-china sentiments here every once in a while.
Seriously, it really made me happy! I hope when OP scrolled through she felt a little tingle of happiness too.
Happy? Not really, but glad we can come to a conclusion to my offhand semi in jest reply.
